# ea2drawio

A simple CLI tool to convert diagram from Sparx EA to Drawio file

## Usage

- select diagram in project tree in Sparx EA
- run script ea2drawio
- diagram will be created in current folder

## Installation

```bash
pip install ea2drawio
```

# Requirements

Python >= 3.7

pywin32
